post.text: Watch live as Hillary takes the stage in Reno to discuss why Donald J. Trump's divisive rhetoric is so dangerous to our future.

comment.author: Whitney
comment.text: hillary will make the great change in USA ! stop white (racist) people !

replies.text: Your campaign manager definitely can hired by Hollywood producers! It's not going to help millions Americans that looking for a job! Millions that scared the radical Islam, millions that Tired of corruption and Washington MAFYA! When it comes to racist... Who said: "don't vote for Bernie because he is Jewish..."
